Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.compiler.gorm

[Java] Class GormTransformer

      • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.compiler.gorm.GormTransformer

      • Transforms GORM entities making the GORM API available to Java.

        Graeme Rocher
